com.okta.sdk.schema

Interface Schema

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Resource, Saveable

    public interface Schema
extends Resource, Saveable
    Schema represents the Resource schema configuration used to determine which fields in an editable resource are required..
    Since:
    0.5.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FieldList getFields()
      Returns a paginated list of all the fields defined by this schema.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.okta.sdk.resource.Resource

        getResourceHref, setResourceHref

      • Methods inherited from interface com.okta.sdk.resource.Saveable

        save

    • Method Detail

      • getFields

        FieldList getFields()
        Returns a paginated list of all the fields defined by this schema.
        Returns:
        The list of fields
